A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fantastic! The real essence of Star Wars comes back here! Absolutely the perfect sequel and bridge in story that was needed. It puts a lot of pressure on episode 9 to make it all come together in the end though. The biggest missing link is how and why snoke came to power. Rey was a little too quick to learn her lessons\, but that can also be remedied in episode 9 with more context
